name: Power Boat Racing 3D game
description:
Crush and race with wonderful and amazing power boat racing 3d game. Now you can use all of your driving expertise and skills on Jet Boat. You didn’t experience any other real Boat racing before.

Race through the jungle river in your boat as fast as you can and escape the jungle before its too late.Get past all the obstacles like whales,wild trees etc int way of your boat.
Try to make high score by beating the previous score and setting a new record speed.

FEATURES:
• EXPERIENCE the real arcade racing thrill
• FEEL the real offshore racing thrill thanks to our realistic water & wave system!
• DRIVE over real exotic locations around the world and ride your custom boat on each of the seven seas.

How to Play:
- Tilt to steer the powerboat
- Touch bottom right gas button to accelerate
- Touch bottom left brake button to slow down
